Disable this to get exact chosen colors
Certain combinations may not be compatible with certain ROMs. In such instances, simply experiment with alternative combinations until you find the one that best suits your needs.
Use if above ones did not work
Fix lag in gcam with gesture navigation
Disable back gesture of left side
Disable back gesture of right side
Make track of volume slider thin
Make track of volume slider thick
Creates a magisk flashable module for this style

This option will create a magisk module inside Download folder in your Internal Storage. Flash the module named IconifyCompanion.zip in Magisk. Always uninstall previous Iconify Companion module (if installed) and reboot before flashing new one.

Note:
• Uninstall the module before updating rom.
• Recreate the module if you change or update rom.
• Do not flash a module which wasn't created based on your rom.
Kill empty space of notch bar
LSPosedモジュールからIconifyを有効にする前に、Iconifyを長押しし、Re-optimizeをクリックしてください。その後、Iconifyを有効にし、SystemUIを再起動してー。これはよりスムーズな体験のために必要だよん
現在、Xposed Onlyモードになっています。LSPosedアプリでiconifyを有効にする必要があります。また、Magiskマネージャーにiconifyモジュールが表示されていることを確認してください。全機能にアクセスするには、iconifyアプリのデータを消去し、インストールプロセスに進んでください！ --deepl

Show iOS like depth wallpaper\nMust use custom lockscreen clock

This feature is currently in beta stage. So bugs are expected.

Known Bugs:
• Always on Display is broken. Disable AOD to avoid display issues.
• Tapping on lockscreen makes the wallpaper jump.
